statements: SELECT * FROM knowledge_graph;
SELECT entity_id, entity_name FROM knowledge_graph WHERE entity_id = 1;
SELECT entity_id, entity_name, related_entity_id FROM knowledge_graph WHERE relation_type = 'parent';
SELECT * FROM knowledge_graph WHERE entity_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT entity_name, relation_type FROM knowledge_graph ORDER BY entity_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_graph WHERE entity_id = 1;
SELECT entity_id, entity_name FROM knowledge_graph WHERE relation_type = 'is_related_to';
SELECT * FROM knowledge_graph WHERE entity_id > 5 ORDER BY entity_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT entity_name FROM knowledge_graph WHERE relation_type IN ('is_related_to', 'is_part_of');
SELECT entity_id, entity_name, related_entity_id FROM knowledge_graph WHERE entity_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY entity_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeGraphNodes;
SELECT node_label FROM KnowledgeGraphNodes WHERE node_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT node_label, node_id FROM KnowledgeGraphNodes WHERE node_label = 'Person' ORDER BY node_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeGraphEdges WHERE source_node_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeGraphEdges WHERE edge_label = 'RELATED_TO' ORDER BY target_node_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeGraphNodes WHERE node_label = 'Concept';
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeGraphNodes WHERE node_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT node_id, node_label FROM KnowledgeGraphNodes WHERE node_label LIKE 'D%';
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeGraphEdges WHERE edge_label = 'RelatedTo' ORDER BY source_node_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeGraphEdges WHERE target_node_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY edge_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM entity_nodes ORDER BY entity_id DESC;
SELECT entity_name FROM entity_nodes WHERE entity_name = 'Example Entity';
SELECT entity_id, entity_name FROM entity_nodes WHERE entity_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM relationships ORDER BY relationship_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM entity_relationships JOIN relationships ON entity_relationships.relationship_id = relationships.relationship_id;
SELECT * FROM entity_nodes;
SELECT entity_id, entity_name FROM entity_nodes ORDER BY entity_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM relationships WHERE relationship_name LIKE '%example%';
SELECT entity_id, COUNT(relationship_id) AS num_relationships FROM entity_relationships GROUP BY entity_id HAVING num_relationships > 1;

SELECT entity_nodes.entity_id, entity_nodes.entity_name, relationships.relationship_name FROM entity_nodes INNER JOIN entity_relationships ON entity_nodes.entity_id = entity_relationships.entity_id INNER JOIN relationships ON entity_relationships.relationship_id = relationships.relationship_id ORDER BY entity_nodes.entity_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM entities;
SELECT entity_name, entity_type FROM entities ORDER BY entity_type DESC;
SELECT entity_id, entity_name FROM entities WHERE entity_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM relationships WHERE relationship_type = 'Friend';
SELECT entity_name FROM entities WHERE entity_type = 'Customer' ORDER BY entity_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM entities;
SELECT entity_name, entity_type FROM entities WHERE entity_id = 1;
SELECT entity_id, entity_name, entity_type FROM entities ORDER BY entity_name DESC;
SELECT entities.entity_name, entity_properties.property_name, entity_properties.property_value FROM entities JOIN entity_properties ON entities.entity_id = entity_properties.property_id;

SELECT entities.entity_name, relationships.relationship_type FROM entities JOIN entity_relationships ON entities.entity_id = entity_relationships.entity_id JOIN relationships ON entity_relationships.relationship_id = relationships.relationship_id;
SELECT * FROM entities
SELECT entity_id, entity_name FROM entities
SELECT * FROM relationships
SELECT relationship_id, relationship_name FROM relationships
SELECT entity_id, entity_name FROM entities ORDER BY entity_name DESC
SELECT entity_id, entity_name FROM entities;
SELECT relationship_name FROM relationships WHERE relationship_id = '4d8fb2f4-ad54-4464-aba3-ec30d770cf2e';
SELECT entity_id_1, entity_id_2 FROM entity_relationships WHERE relationship_id = '421f8762-3b96-42e1-9166-2aaa8389432c' ORDER BY entity_id_1 ASC;
SELECT entity_id, property_name, property_value FROM entity_properties JOIN entity_property_mapping ON entity_properties.property_id = entity_property_mapping.property_id;
SELECT entity_id, entity_name, property_name, property_value FROM entities JOIN entity_property_mapping ON entities.entity_id = entity_property_mapping.entity_id WHERE property_name = 'color';
